attributes.action: Make trans conversion therapy illegal in the UK
attributes.additional_details: Despite all major counselling and psychotherapy bodies in the UK, including the NHS, condemning trans conversion therapy, it is still legal and trans individuals in the UK are still exposed to this psychological and emotional abuse to this day. The very thought of this sickens me, and I would like to see it stopped one day.
attributes.background:
I would like the Government to:
• make running trans conversion therapy in the UK a criminal offence
• forcing trans people to attend conversion therapy a criminal offence
• sending trans people abroad to try to convert them a criminal offence
• protect trans individuals from conversion therapy

rejection.details:
We have published the following petitions, which you might like to sign:

Ensure Trans people are fully protected under any conversion therapy ban: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/613556

Ban LGBT+ Conversion Therapy: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/613518
